Subjects: miracles; Conception, feast of; instruction, religious
_description: Founding of the Feast of the Conception (in Cursor Mundi)

BodFair14.First Lines:
Listenes godemen wiþ ȝour leuelaþ me were ȝou
                    to greueþat ȝe mi talkin þink toghfor me þink
                    neuer mare I nogh…
BodFair14.Last Lines:
…haue merci on vs now & ay& namely atte our ending
                    day
BodFair14.Attributed Title:
Of þe concepcioun of our lauedi / puplist bi an angel on þe see
                    (f. 106rb)

BLCottVesAIII.First Lines:
[L]isten god men wit your leueWele lath me war yow for to
                    greue…
BLCottVesAIII.Last Lines:
…Sco dos us her to serue hir suaÞat we be wit hir euer
                    and .A.
BLCottVesAIII.Note:
Space was left for enlarged initial ‘L’, which was left
                    blank.

EDCPCM.First Lines:
[L]istnis mi god men wit ȝor lefWel lase me war you for to
                    gref…

                    a

GottingenTheo107.First Lines:
[L]Istes gode men wid ȝur leueful lath me war ȝu forto
                    greue…
GottingenTheo107.Last Lines:
…Scho do vs here at serue hir suaþat we be wid hir euer
                    and a Amen
